Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems on the train at Forest Park. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problems on the train at Forest Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
